author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38213

#### PR description:

Title says it all.
Resolves problem described at https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/failure-at-tier0-of-sistripcalcosmicsnano/11186.

#### PR validation:

Private.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38213
title: [12.3.X] protect `ALCARECOSiStripCalCosmicsNano` for missing tracks (when Tracker DCS is OFF)
